plot: Nombre Original: Root of All Evil?Director: Russell BarnesActores: Yousef Al-Khattab, Richard Dawkins and Ted HaggardRichard Dawkins' highly critical documentary attacks the pulsing heart of all mainstream religion- faith; with special focus on Islam, Judaism, and Christianity. Contains repeated references to sectorial schools as child abuse and faith as the stepping stone to terrorist activity
title: ¿ La raiz de todo mal ?
